front.title: A list of possible PINT functions

abstract.t: This Internet Draft is one of a pair written at the request of oneof the SPIRITS Working Group co-chairs in order to elicit discussionon what extended functionality SPIRITS may be used to provide; thePINT work has similar requirements for a definition of the buildingblocks that might be used in future services (and so need to besupported by the protocol). This note provides the 'mirror image' ofthe associated SPIRITS draft, listing functional building blocks thatmay be executed in response to future PINT protocol requests.
